alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Millard...central Juab...south central Box Elder and Tooele Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 346 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Wendover to 11 miles south of Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 35 mph. A wind gust to 50 mph has been reported with this line. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge, Utah Test and Training Range South, Delle, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Skull Valley, Clive, Callao, Bonneville Salt Flats and Little Sahara State Park. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 3 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties
